mtundu: Gulu la data ngati manambala kapena mawu
lupu: Kubwereza mobwerezabwereza kwa code mpaka vuto litakwaniritsidwa
ntchito: Chida chogwiritsidwanso ntchito chokhala ndi ntchito inayake
kubwereranso: Ntchito yodziyitanira yokha kuti ithetse mavuto ang'onoang'ono
uwu: Kujambula mapulogalamu mozungulira zinthu ndi katundu ndi makhalidwe
wopanga: Amamasulira khodi yapamwamba kukhala yowerengeka ndi makina
womasulira: Imakhazikitsa mzere ndi mzere popanda kumasulira kale
kukonza: Kupeza ndi kukonza zolakwika mu code yanu
kuwongolera mtundu: Dongosolo lotsata kusintha kwa ma code pakapita nthawi
api: Cholumikizira cha mapulogalamu kuti azilumikizana wina ndi mzake
kapangidwe ka data: Njira yokonzekera deta kuti igwiritsidwe ntchito bwino
mndandanda wolumikizidwa: Deta yosungidwa ngati zinthu zolumikizidwa ndi zolozera
mtengo: Deta ya hierarchical, yofanana ndi dongosolo la banja
mtengo wa binary: Mtengo umene node iliyonse imakhala ndi ana osachepera awiri
hash table: Imagwiritsa ntchito ntchito kuti ipeze deta mwachangu potengera makiyi
kusaka kwa binary: Amasaka bwino chinthu chomwe chili pamndandanda wosanjidwa
network: Gulu la zida zolumikizidwa zomwe zimagawana zothandizira
database: Kusonkhanitsa deta mwadongosolo kuti musungidwe ndi kupeza
opareting'i sisitimu: Mapulogalamu omwe amayang'anira zida zamakompyuta komanso kulumikizana kwa ogwiritsa ntchito
pang'ono: Gawo laling'ono kwambiri la data ya digito (0 kapena 1)
boolean: Mtundu wa data womwe ungakhale wowona kapena wabodza
nambala yoyandama: Mtundu wa data woyimira manambala enieni okhala ndi ma decimal
chikhalidwe: Imawongolera kachitidwe ka code potengera mawu omwe amawunika ma booleans
cholowa: Kupanga makalasi atsopano kutengera omwe alipo
polymorphism: Zolinga zamagulu osiyanasiyana zomwe zimayankha mosiyanasiyana ku uthenga womwewo
kufotokoza: Kubisa zambiri zovuta kuseri kwa mawonekedwe osavuta
encapsulation: Kusonkhanitsa deta ndi njira mkati mwa chinthu
